sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; function OrderPage(props) { const { popup, thankPopupFunc, thankPopup, totalItems, items, total, packaging, onReload, } = props; console.log(items); return (
{popup && totalItems !== 0 ? (

Your Cart

{items.map((item1, id1) => item1.qty !== 0 ? (

{item1.name} x {item1.qty}

Cost : ${item1.cost}

Total Cost : ${(item1.cost * item1.qty).toFixed(2)}
) : null )}

Items Price:

${total.toFixed(2)}

Delivery Charges:

$3

Packaging:

${packaging.toFixed(2)}

Total Price:

${(total + packaging + 3).toFixed(2)}

) : null} {/* {thank_popup ? (

Thank you

We will deliver your package at your doorstep shortly.

) : null} */}
); } export default OrderPage;
